# Mantle of the Fiery Spirit (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[9th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 9]], [[8th Level Druid Spells|Druid 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 19th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 19]], [[BoXM 16th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 16]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a burning lump of coal and a fire opal worth 5,000 gp), XP (2,000 XP)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless) 

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 118

*Mantle of the fiery spirit* permanently grants the target the fire subtype.
